page.title: 07PEATLING LODGE FARM
page.content: THIS FARM HAS BEEN IN THE OWNER'S FAMILY FOR AT LEAST 30 YEARS. ALL OF THE FAMILY WORK ON THE FARM WHICH SPECIALIZES IN FATTENING UP CATTLE AND SELLING THEM AT THE MARKET. THEY HAVE 75 COWS. THE FARM IS SPREAD OVER AN AREA OF 157 ACRES. THE FARM IS SOLELY RUN BY MEMBERS OF THE FAMILY. ALTHOUGH A PUBLIC FOOTPATH RUNS STRAIGHT THROUGH THE FARMLAND, OVER THE PAST YEARS THERE HAS BEEN NO VANDALISM TO CROPS, FENCING,ETC. A NUMBER OF BEEHIVES, WHICH ARE OWNED BY DR. ROWS OF COUTESTHORPE, ARE ALSO ON THE FARM. WE SPOKE TO THE FARMER'S WIFE ABOUT LIFE ON THE FARM. SHE SAID THAT ALTHOUGH LIFE WAS VERY HARD, IT WAS ALSO VERY REWARDING. SHE WOULDN'T MOVE TO A MORE SECURE JOB FOR ANYTHING.
